net.derquinse.common.log

Class ContextLog

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.derquinse.common.log.ContextLog

  • public final class ContextLog
extends Object
    An SLF4J logger with an optional hierarchical context and String.format(java.lang.String, java.lang.Object...) formatting.
    Author:
    Andres Rodriguez
